titles.title: God's Fire, It's Burning In My Soul

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God's fire, it's burning in my soul.
God's fire, He's making me whole.
God's fire, it's sweeping o'er the earth.
Thank God I've got God's fire.
And it's burning in my soul.
Thank God I've got God's fire.
And it's burning in my soul.
